bike.description: Reynolds 520 double-butted chromoly main tubes with SST tubing diameters, double-tapered cromo stays, extended head tube with reinforced collars, custom laser cut road disc dropouts with double eyelets

components.description: Carbon fiber unicrown with steel steerer, disc brake mounts, low-rider carrier mounts and forged dropouts with single eyelets
Alex DC25 disc specific double-wall rim, 32H, Formula alloy disc road hubs and 14g stainless steel spokes
Vittoria Randonneur Cross with Double Shield puncture protection, 700 x 28c
Shimano Tiagra RD-4600GS rear and Tiagra FD-4603 front with 28.6mm alloy clamp
Shimano Tiagra ST-4600 Dual Control STI, 30-Speed
Touring platform style, full alloy with toe clips
Avid BB-5 cable actuated disc brake with 160mm G2 CleanSweep rotors and Shimano Tiagra ST-4600 STI levers
Ritchey Road Comp Logic, 6061 aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/56), 440mm (58/61)
Jamis adjustable threadless system (ATS) forged aluminum stem, 10JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (48/51), 105mm (54/56), 115mm (58/61). ATS shim length 100mm
Jamis suede tape with Jamis logo and "J" end plug
Jamis alloy micro-adjust, 27.2 x 350mm with cromo seat pin
Selle San Marco SPID Arrowhead with Syntex cover and carbon steel rails
Full coverage fenders with adjustable stays and new designed mud flaps
